author: candleSmartHome.com
description: Show your favourite photos, acts as a screensaver.
name: Photo Frame

Interval.description: How many seconds between changing to another random photo.

Screensaver delay.description: After how many seconds of inactivity should the photo frame switch itself on as a screensaver? Select 0 if you don't want photo frame to act as a screensaver. The default is 60 seconds. The maximum is 600 (10 minutes)

Fit to screen.description: Pictures might can contained within the screen edges, with black bars around them. Alternatively, pictures could cover the screen fully, but then parts may be cut off. It also possible to mix this randomly.

Animations and effects.description: Apply subtle effects to the photos, such as zooms, pans, and the Ken Burns effect.

Black and white.description: Show all photos in black and white. This does not permanently change the photos, it's just an effect.

Show date.description: Show the current day and date on top of the photos.

Show clock.description: Show the current time on top of the photos.

Show weather.description: Show weather data on top of the photos. For this the Candle Weather addon must also be installed and configured with at least one location.

Show Voco timers.description: Show active Voco voice control timers on top of the photos when in screensaver mode. It will only show timers that are due to end within the hour. For this the Voco addon must also be installed.

Debugging.description: Advanced. Enable this to see much more detail in the internal log about what this add-on is doing.
